Class XYSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.botimpls.azardBot.XYSupport

  • public class XYSupport
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides additional methods for operating on 2d vectors.Unit vector are called here direction as they are used by the game.
